IncorrectQuery: SELECT * FROM campaigns JOIN inventory ON campaigns.campaign_id = inventory.stock_status
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = campaign_id INNER JOIN inventory ON campaigns.campaign_id=inventory.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM campaigns c JOIN inventory i ON c.campaign_id = i.referenced_product_id WHERE c.campaign_status = 'active' AND i.stock_status = 'low' ORDER BY c.campaign_id = 'desc';
